job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Proto AI is actively seeking Software Engineers to join its growing Engineering department to work on its growing software development needs. Proto AI provides enterprise-scale AI solutions through software-as-a-service applications in several verticals. Responsibilities: Effectively design, develop, and operate software systems at scale Assist in the design & architecture for new products Ability to convert applied mathematics to computational engineering Excellent written and oral communication skills Develop and maintain unit and integration tests Working with Microsoft Azure to deploy highly available, scalable, and secure applications Work efficiently and meet project deadlines with limited supervision Participate as a team member in sprint demonstrations and presentations to product stakeholders Strong attention to detail, critical thinking skills, and solid troubleshooting ability Create the functional design & architecture for new products & features Maintain control of source, research and trade secrets Convert applied mathematics to computational engineering Qualifications: Self-starter who needs minimal supervision, is curious about software, and comes with a team-first approach to the position Enjoys a start-up atmosphere and is flexible, shows good judgement, takes initiative, and is willing to take on a variety of tasks and responsibilities as needed to achieve goals A 4-yr college degree in Computer Science or a related field At least 5 years software development experience, preferably with C# and C++ 3 years of experience building web, microservice solutions in Windows/Linux environments 2+ years of experience building and deploying scalable, and secure enterprise solutions with Azure or AWS Understanding of Microservices design, development, and deployment on Azure Service Fabric Experience with DevOps practices for CI/CD, release management, and automation using Azure DevOps Pluses: Familiarity with developing software to support parallel computing Familiarity with Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, and Durability (ACID) rules Understanding of inter-process communication to include custom marshaling and threading scenarios
